name: Spooky Scary Game
description:
Rules:

Collect candies and bring them back to your spawn. Have the most candy when the timer runs out.

Controls:

Player 1:

W = Jump.

A = Left.

S = Slide.

D = Right.

Player 2:

ArrowUp = Jump.

ArrowLeft = Left.

ArrowDown = Slide.

ArrowRight = Right:

Controller:

LeftDpad or leftThumbStickleft = left;

RightDpad or leftThumbStickright = right;

A = Jump.

X = Slide.
